NSApplication
Main
public.app-category.utilities
$(EXECUTABLE_NAME)
identifier "com.maccleaner.helper"
MacCleaner needs to control other applications to manage them.
MacCleaner needs administrator access to clean system files.
MacCleaner needs access to your Desktop to scan for large files and duplicates.
MacCleaner needs access to your Documents to scan for large files and duplicates.
MacCleaner needs access to your Downloads folder to clean temporary files.
MacCleaner needs access to external drives to clean them.
MacCleaner needs access to network drives to clean them.
MacCleaner needs access to cloud storage to scan for duplicates.
MacCleaner needs access to scan for duplicate media files.
MacCleaner needs access to your Photos library to find duplicate photos.
MacCleaner needs access to clean calendar cache files.
MacCleaner needs access to clean reminders cache files.
MacCleaner needs access to clean contacts cache files.
